title: , 44 , 45 , 46 , 47 , 50 and 63 of the Employment Permits Act 2024 (No. 17 of
heading: 4. Regulation 38(a) of the Principal Regulations is amended—
text_raw:
4. Regulation 38(a) of the Principal Regulations is amended— 

(a) 

by substituting “€30,000” for “€27,000”, and 

(b) by substituting “€14.79” for “€13.31”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

17 December, 2024. 

PETER BURKE, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 31st December, 2024.

title: , 44 , 45 , 46 , 47 , 50 and 63 of the Employment Permits Act 2024 (No. 17 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Employment Permits Regulations 2024 to change 
the minimum annual remuneration and minimum hourly rate of remuneration 
under general employment permits granted for employment as a health care 
assistant, a care worker or a home carer. 

These Regulations may be cited as the Employment Permits (Amendment) (No. 
5) Regulations 2024.
